info.name: Tweetdark Red
info.description: This is a modified version of TweetDeck Stealth (Orginal Author QuadPiece from userstyles.org)
info.additionalInfo: Only thing changed in this was the color values from QuadPiece'a TweetDeck Stealth. All credit goes to the author. I'm uploading this mainly because I want to redownload it on my other computers with ease.
